scripts.build:all: concurrently "npm run build --prefix arkadasstrapi" "npm run build --prefix arkadasweb"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run develop --prefix arkadasstrapi" "npm run dev --prefix arkadasweb"
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start --prefix arkadasstrapi" "npm run start --prefix arkadasweb"
